Posts.Content: Dec 19, 2008 12:20PM ilovemywoowoo wrote: Go and have your thyroid checked. what other symptoms do you have?. I had dry hair, dry skin, slow pulse, and all I ever wanted to do was sleep, I just couldnt shake it off and HAD to go to bed after being up for about an hour, I would sleep 2 or 3 times a day. I had an underactive thyroid.
